directions: Pulse nuts in a food processor until coarsely chopped. Add dried fruit and pulse until chopped. Add Sherry, zest, and spices and pulse until incorporated.
ingredients: 2/3 cup whole almonds with skin, toasted and cooled
1 cup dried apricots (preferably California/Pacific), coarsely chopped (5 ounces)
2/3 cup pitted dried dates, coarsely chopped
1 (3- by 1/2-inch) strip orange zest, finely chopped (1 teaspoon)
title: Apricot, Date, and Pistachio Haroseth
